name: The Sunblade

system.description: A radiant greatsword forged in the heart of a dying star. Pure sunlight flows through its crystalline blade, and it shines like a beacon of hope in the darkest places. Undead creatures shrink from its radiance, and darkness itself seems to flee before its wielder. The weapon is said to have been a gift from the solar deities to their greatest champion.

notes: Features: Sunburst (massive radiant AoE), Searing Light (bonus radiant damage on all attacks), Daybreak (permanent light aura), Smite Undead (double damage to undead), Solar Flare (ranged beam attack)
